giftCardEmailIntro: Your VOLT<sup>®</sup> Gift Card has been created.  Do not delete this message – to redeem the gift card you must use the gift card claim code below. You may want to print a copy of this message for easy reference later.
giftCardEmailInstructions: Follow these steps to redeem the gift card:
giftCardEmailsteps:
• Visit {0}
  • Enter the Claim Code when prompted during checkout.
  • Gift card funds will then be applied automatically to orders.
  • (NOTE: if you have an account, the remaining funds will be added to your account. If you do not have an account, you will need to use the claim code again to use the remaining funds on any future purchases.)
  • You must pay for any remaining balance on your order with another payment method.

contractnotes: Each application is reviewed manually. This process typically takes 24 to 72 hours. To expedite your application, please call customer service at 813-978-3700.
contractnotes1: In order to qualify for a wholesale account, we must be able to independently verify you are in the business of installing and reselling landscape lights (e.g. be an electrician, landscaper, irrigation contractor, etc.).
